p: Six years after the last Hb mass measurement of the athletes at age 19 (Steiner et al., 2019) when the endurance athletes were at age 25, we analyzed which of the 10 cross-country skiers and triathletes were members of the Swiss national team (NT group) and which athletes had terminated their career (TC group). We then retrospectively compared the Hb mass of both groups at ages 16 and 19.
